name: cousinted
text:
People, you should hold your lames! this was obviously a gimmick poster. A gimmick poster doing a perfect impression:

name: saint
text: i'm not sure I follow.

name: jawsh
text: I like it somehow

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Me too. I mean, I'm still completely lost. But there's a lot of conviction there.

Hm.

name: chuvak
text: I played a show with the international playboys once. They are from Montana, no?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: they were drowning me.

name: eviltkat
text: The hose has become my number one undesirables deterrent

name: tinhand
text: I want to know the story behind this "the hose", but I know there isn't one.

name: tatterdemalion
text:
Every time you comment upon something, tinhand, I imagine Nomi saying it, just to me.

This makes me more happy than I can properly express.

name: paperboy_2000
text: Milkin is such a bad Jehovah's Witness he doesn't know how to react to an imminent doorstep soaking.  This upsets Ray.

name: liquidcruelty
text:
I think that what occurred here was that Ray delivered a threat that he thought would scare the dude away, but then realized that he did not in fact feel like going to get the hose
so he settled for shoving him and yelling "the hose"

name: slalvation
text: I imagined that he was trying to put Milkin off his guard -- Milkin was expecting him to go get the hose, so was not prepared to defend himself when suddenly pushed out the doorway.

name: slalvation
text: Haha, there are TWO Ls in "Milklin"!

name: fosters
text: I like to think that this is EXACTLY what "getting the hose" means as far as Ray is concerned. Even the pause. He wasn't waiting for something, a pause is part of the process.

name: connellingus
text: Ray is just bitter because Milklin pestered him about nine months before, here . Judging by the name tag, that was apparently before he was rescinded.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: nice fucking spot, dude!

name: eviltkat
text:
THE HOSE!

I need to start using the hose

name: stuart
text: IT RUBS THE LOTION ON ITS SKIN

name: foetus_punch
text: Or it gets pushed and yelled at some again?

name: notcool
text: THE HOSE!

name: atticusonline
text: THE HOSE!

name: fattypneumonia
text: The clamps! THE CLAAAAMPS!!!

name: mygoodfriend
text: Milklin is a stranger and Ray is pretty much being a cock to him, unfortunately.

name: tbtabby
text: Bear in mind, Ray was stoned when he said that.

name: splendorr
text:
As noted in a comment above, Ray met Milklin on a Fuck You Friday.

Also, membership in a door to door evangelical organization moves you from "stranger" to "known quantity" immediately.

name: shogun
text: Tankity tank! Tankity Tank!

name: paco
text: Milkin was supposed to leave when Ray mentioned the hose. Ray got pissed when he didn't.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Should I do a ding dong update? I got a lot of good mail.

name: charchar
text:
As of press time this strip is rated 4.4
doesn't that look a little like a face?

name: tekende
text: Well, damnit, it does now.

name: killingthejay
text: the pause in panel 3 is what really makes this strip

name: chuvak
text: This is my favorite achewood. And it fell on my birthday. Amazing!

name: jhunter
text:
I like to think Ray doesn't even have a hose, and that The Hose is just his name for a real raw, dirty kind of fighting move wherein you extend both palms and slap Jehova's witnesses in the nipples

straight backward somersault, scientists are still figuring it out

name: zem
text:
i hate when people explain comic strips but here i am about to do it

i think ray said "let me get the hose" as kind of a stock unthinking response and then he decided he should follow up on it

this has been my book report for Ray gives Milklin The Hose thank you for listening

name: zapatos
text: "Milklin the Hose" eh?  Ha, the title makes me snicker.

name: gigoloferocious
text: Aahh,they way grandad used to do it.

name: bozendoka
text: The Hose'd!

text: Of course if you want to avoid the enounter alotgether you could display some Give Blood stickers on your front door.

name: dtilove
text: I tried this on a bandmate once. I ended up with a busted lip and a happy feeling in my tummy.

name: derp
text: religious intolerance is hilarious am i right

name: i_love_kate
text: Yep.

name: thevoidcontrols
text: second

name: splendorr
text:
It's not so much religiousness that's being intolerable here. It's barging in on someone else's life with it, just talking to anyone foolish enough to open the door.

Also implied: by-rote proselytizing is the refuge of the otherwise-ineffective?

name: carlyle
text: Man Roast Beef and Ray are kind of dicks.
